title: Products
description: SHL products have been carefully designed to produce highly reusable data and to enhance all stages of the talent experience that drive performance and retention.

title: Occupational Personality Questionnaire (OPQ)
description: Our occupational personality questionnaire helps you to get accurate, bias-free assessments by matching individual working preferences to business requirements.

title: Skills Assessments that Predict On-the-job Success
description: Measure the skills needed to succeed in any role with pre-packaged skills assessments. Fast and accurate measurement of job-relevant skills.

title: SHL Motivational Questionnaire
description: Build an engaged, high-performing workforce using our motivation questionnaire (MQ) by matching individual employee motivation to team and organizational goals.

title: Situational Judgement Tests
description: Using our Situational Judgment Tests (SJT), you can measure candidates' behavioral fit to a given role by assessing their response to a specific work situation.

title: SHL Cognitive Assessments
description: Measure candidates' potential and ability to learn, adapt, and succeed in any role with SHL's cognitive ability tests and assessments.

title: Measure Past Performance and Future Potential
description: Make strategic employee decisions with confidence and identify development gaps by gathering on-demand, 360-degree feedback from multiple stakeholders.

title: Assessments
description: Our unmatched portfolio of talent assessment tools helps you to clearly map employees and their skills to specific business needs and outcomes.

title: Behavioral Assessments
description: SHL's behavioral assessments offer an engaging experience to candidates and help you to identify their behavioral fit to the roles.

title: SHL Personality Assessments
description: Improve your hiring process with science-backed personality assessments that reveal each candidate’s preferences, motivations, and remote-work capability.

title: The Smarter Way to Interview Talent
description: Screen thousands of candidates quickly with our video interview tool and provide a seamless live video interview experience for shortlisted applicants.

title: Skills & Simulations
description: Measure practical application and knowledge to scale your search for highly skilled candidates using SHL's skills assessments tools and job simulations.

title: Assess Agents in a Real Contact Center Environment
description: SHL’s Call Center Simulations and assessment tool helps you to identify agents with the critical competencies and personality in a real-life call center environment.

title: Business Skills Assessment Tests for Deep Insights
description: With our computer literacy test, assess candidates' Microsoft Office proficiency, such as working with graphs and charts, creating presentations, and more.

title: SHL Coding Skills Assessment and Simulations
description: Shortlist 45% more candidates within half the usual hiring time with our coding skills assessment for full stack, data engineering, front-end and more roles.

title: Fast, Simple Technical Skill Assessment
description: SHL Technical Skills assessment helps you to measure knowledge of 180+ technology concepts in less than 15 minutes for Full Stack, Front-end, Data Science, DevOps, and more roles.

title: AI-powered Language Proficiency Tests
description: SHL’s AI-powered suite of communication and language proficiency tests automates language assessment, helping you to faster find and hire the right people.

title: Go Digital and Deliver a Superior Experience
description: Our end-to-end virtual assessment and development centers provide the most efficient and accurate way of identifying potential from anywhere in the world.

title: Find assessments that best meet your needs.
description: Browse through our product assessment catalog for unrivalled employee assessments that evaluate cognitive ability, personality, behavior, skills, and more.
